knimeNode.name: Value Filter Widget
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a value filter widget for use in components views. Takes a data table and returns a filtered data table with only the selected values of a chosen column.

intro.p: Creates a value filter widget for use in components views. Takes a data table and returns a filtered data table with only the selected values of a chosen column.

The node supports custom CSS styling. You can simply put CSS rules into a single string and set it as a flow variable 'customCSS' in the node configuration dialog. You will find the list of available classes and their description on our documentation page.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in the dialog.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the view, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If selected the column is locked and can not be selected from within the view.
The values that are selected by default.

By default the List and Twinlist components adjust their height to display all possible choices without a scroll bar. If the setting is enabled, you will be able to limit the number of visible options in case you have too many of them. The setting is available only for List or Twinlist selection type.

A number of options visible in the List or Twinlist component without a vertical scroll bar. Changing this value will also affect the component's height. Notice that for Twinlist the height cannot be less than the overall height of the control buttons in the middle. The setting is available only for List or Twinlist selection type.

ports.inPort: Table containing the column(s) with values to be filtered.
ports.outPort: Filtered table containing only rows with the selected values.
